'''1.16.10.02''' is a minor update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on July 21, 2020, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.10]]. It is still compatible with [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.1|1.16.1]] clients.{{verify}}

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.16.10 clients.
